answers: Be careful what information you share online
Keep your computer's anti-virus up to date
questions.prompt: Which of the following is a best practice when using LinkedIn?

answers: Use the same password for all social media accounts
Don't accept friend requests from unknown individuals
Use the messenger application when communicating sensitive information to co-workers
Make sure your posts can be seen by anyone
questions.prompt: Which of the following is a best practice when using Facebook?
True or False, you should check your social media settings periodically to review permissions to your account and data access?

answers: Someone who hacks into social media accounts
Someone who attempts to socialize online with social media users for the purpose of hacking into their account
Someone who uses a computer to hack into a social media account
Someone who manipulates people through social interactions (in person, over the phone, or in writing)
questions.prompt: Which of these best defines a "Social Engineer" or a "Social Hacker?"
True or False, properly setting your Privacy Settings on social media guarantees that you won't be the victim of hacking?

title: You've landed on Your Online Presence.
